insurancemodel

Class ClientDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • insurancemodel.ClientDetails

  • public class ClientDetails
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the details of each individual client; involving data relevant to a particular client only.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClientDetails

        public ClientDetails(java.lang.String newClientID,
                     Name newName,
                     Address newAddress,
                     PolicyList newPolicies)
        Constructor for the ClientDetails.java class. Parses in all the data that is needed to create a full ClientDetail object.
        Parameters:
        newClientID - the unique ID of that client
        newName - the title, initials and surname of that client
        newAddress - this street, town or city and postcode of the client
        newPolicies - this details of the policies that the client holds
